text: Aaron James Ramsey (born 26 December 1990) is a Welsh footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Juventus and the Wales national football team. ==Career statistics== Club Season League FA Cup League Cup Europe Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Cardiff City 2006–07 1 0 0 0 0 0 – 1 0 2007–08 15 1 5 1 1 0 – 21 2 Total 16 1 5 1 1 0 – 22 2 Arsenal 2008–09 9 0 4 0 3 0 6 1 22 1 2009–10 18 3 2 1 3 0 6 0 29 4 2010–11 7 1 1 0 0 0 0 0 8 1 2011–12 34 2 3 0 0 0 7 1 44 3 2012–13 36 1 3 0 1 0 7 1 47 2 2013–14 23 10 2 1 1 0 8 5 35 16 Total 127 17 15 2 8 0 34 8 184 27 Nottingham Forest (loan) 2010–11 5 0 0 0 0 0 – 5 0 Cardiff City (loan) 2010–11 6 1 0 0 0 0 – 6 1 Career Total 154 19 20 3 9 0 34 8 217 30 ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Cardiff City Runner- up: *FA Cup 2007–08 ;Arsenal Winner: *FA Cup: 2013–14 Runner-up: *Football League Cup: 2010–11 ===Individual=== *Welsh Young Player of the Year (2): 2009, 2010 *Arsenal Player of the Month (5): May 2013, August 2013, September 2013, October 2013 November 2013 *Barclays Player of the Month: September 2013 *London Player of the Year: 2014 *FA Cup Final Man of the Match: 2014 *Arsenal Player of the Season: 2013/2014 ==References== ==Other websites== *Aaron Ramsey profile at Arsenal F.C. * *Aaron Ramsey profile at Goal.com Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh footballers Category:Premier League players Category:Arsenal F.C. players Category:Cardiff City F.C. players Category:Nottingham Forest F.C. players Category:UEFA Euro 2016 players Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:Footballers at the 2012 Summer Olympics
